description:
A wasted Takato has spent the night with Ayagi. The next morning, Takato looks at his phone and sees that Junta had been trying to contact him all night…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nande Koitsu to Hotel de Issho ni... Masaka... Iya Iya Iya Nai yo na? Sonna... Son....
Why Am I at a Hotel with Him... Did We... There`s No Way... Is There!?
なんでコイツとホテルで一緒に... まさか... いやいやいやないよな? そんな... そん....
